Description: Up for sale is a signature from one of Metal's greatest shredders, Synyster Gates of Avenged Sevenfold. This guitar is extremely high quality coming out of South Korea. The Invader pickups in the one really sing! The guitar features a mahogany body, with neck through construction. The mahogany neck has an ebony fingerboard with the artists custom pearloid inlay. Two Invader humbuckers for insane tone. Black hardware consisting of Grover tuners and a Floyd Rose locking tremolo round out the feature set of this fine instrument. Trem arm is missing.  Construction: Set-Neck with Ultra Access Body: mahogany Neck: 3-piece mahogany Neck joint: Ultra Access Scale: 25.5" Fingerboard: bound ebony Frets: 24, extra jumbo Inlays: "SYN" with DeathBat at the 12th fret Nut: Graph Tech Tusq Pickups: Seymour Duncan Invaders Electronics: Vol/Tone (with coils-splitting)/3-way switch Bridge: Floyd Rose Original tremolo with locking nut Tuners: Grover Hardware: black This guitar is used and shows a few signs of wear. There are a few scratches and dings on the body as shown. See pics for full cosmetic details. Serialized w11101236 8lbs 4oz No case included. Trem arm is missing.
Title: 2011 Schecter Synyster Gates Custom (USED)
